settings.shop_text: Check out products from our lovely vendors in the marketplace
settings.podcast_text: Listen to all our podcasts and download our PDFs

settings.about_text: The medical student and junior doctor husband and wife team behind¬†medico¬†lifestyle. We have a mission to create a community of healthcare professionals for learning, growing and shopping. We hope you enjoy our curated market place of beautiful products created by and for healthcare people. We know you will love them as much as we do.

settings.collection_title: Our top picks from the marketplace

settings.podcast_text: Tackling touch medical topics and welcoming guests to talk about their work in the world of healthcare and beyond. In our clinical episodes Emily and Jonas discuss details of clinical cases including anatomy, physiology, management and pharmacology. We also speak to fantastic guests who teach us something new about the world of health care.

settings.news_text: Finally an e-mail you will look forward to reading. There will be no need to hit the unsubscribe button as each of our newsletters will be filled with education, interest and beautiful creations.

settings.shop_text: Take a look at our curated marketplace where a small amount from every sale goes to a charity our community cares about. Vendors from all over the world are designing and creating beautiful things to make you smile.

settings.info_text: Sell your own products and reach thousands of buyers to earn cash for yourself and for charity!

settings.title: Create and share your products!
settings.text: The¬†medico¬†lifestyle marketplace is a curated collection of items created by independent vendors. Our unique vendors are all hand picked to serve our community and create things we all need or love!

settings.title: How does it work?
settings.text_one: If you want to sell on our marketplace you can set up your own online market stall in just a few simple steps. Once the¬†Medico¬†Lifestyle team have had a look at what you have to offer you will be up and running and selling to our community in a matter of moments.¬†Log into your own marketplace page, view your orders and payments and support charities while you do it!
Setting up and managing a store is easy but if you do have any issues we are always on hand to offer support.
settings.text_two: We are commited to supporting charities that our community supports through our marketplace.
settings.text_three: We support secure payments through all major methods including Apple Pay. All transaction costs are included simply in our 15% commission.

settings.text: ‚ÄúThrough Medico, I‚Äôve been able to share my handmade pins and the community is so lovely and supportive.‚Äù
settings.name: Georgia Pinkton

settings.text_one_one: At¬†Medico¬†Lifestyle we are passionate about keeping the costs to our vendors down. We want to encourage you to set up a store but don‚Äôt believe you should have to pay to do so. Why should you pay for something before you‚Äôve tried it?
settings.text_one_two: With no set up costs and an overall commission fee of just 15%. No hidden fees or additional transaction costs.
settings.text_one_three: This is overall 50% cheaper than one of the leading market place websites. We want to your business to be a success.
settings.text_two_one: By listing your products on our market place you are accessing a unique customer base of health care people who are looking for exactly what you are selling. As well as making money for yourself and building your successful side hustle each sale is also donating to one of our community charities.
settings.text_two_two: You will also be supporting our community by helping to keep all of our educational content and podcast entirely free which goes a long way to widening access to healthcare careers.
settings.text_two_three:
You will also benefit from the opportunity to be featured as a vendor on our social media for no additional cost to you. We want all of our vendors to be successful and feel a part of the¬†Medico¬†Lifestyle community.

You will also receive our newsletter specifically for vendors giving you tips for selling and keeping you up to date about any upgrades to the site.
settings.text_three_one: We do not have specific requirements for what is eligible to be sold on our website. If you feel like you are part of our community of healthcare people or you are selling something unique you think would have a place here then we would love to see it!

settings.blog_text_one: Welcome to our blog a place for us to share our stories and those from our community. Whatever your background we think you‚Äôll find something that interests you.
settings.blog_text_two: Go on and have a good read.

settings.pod_text_one: We tackle tough medical topics and welcome guests to talk about their work in the world of healthcare and beyond.
settings.pod_text_two: In our clinical episodes we discuss details of clinical cases including anatomy, physiology, management and pharmacology. In our interview episodes we talk to a lovely healthcare person doing something a little different in the world of healthcare.

settings.about_text_one: We are Emily and Jonas the husband and wife team behind¬†Medico¬†Lifestyle. Emily is a graduate Medical student with a BSc in Medical Biology. Her journey to medical school wasn‚Äôt straight forward giving her loads of experience in different work, and applications. She is currently in her clinical years studying in London. Jonas is a Foundation Year 2 doctor in the South East. He is an aspiring Anaesthetist and Intensive Care doctor. Over the past year he has worked in Intensive care throughout the Coronavirus Pandemic and in different hospital and community specialties.
settings.about_text_two: When we are not studying or working we love the outdoors. We enjoy cycling, walking and have even started some outdoor swimming. Any activity is good as long as it finishes up in a cup of tea and some cake.

settings.about_text_one: We started¬†Medico¬†Lifestyle to create a community of creative people with links to healthcare. We want to bring in people from all different areas who are passionate about what they do. We have always felt that working in medicine connects us to people globally with the shared aim of better health for all. We also know lots of people have many skills outside their ‚Äòday job‚Äô. We wanted to combine this by creating a platform that can showcase people‚Äôs creativity, educate, and support charities which share our values.

settings.quote: We want to create a platform that can showcase people‚Äôs creativity, educate, and support charities which share our values.

settings.faq_answer: Medico Lifestyle is an online community with a marketplace platform allowing Vendors from our community to open up shops to sell their amazing products.

settings.faq_question: How does the Medico Marketplace work?
settings.faq_answer: We invite vendors to join our marketplace, add their products and then sell to our community of healthcare people. Anyone can join if they create something we feel our community would love.

Our marketplace sells products from a collection of different vendors. If the product you‚Äôve bought isn‚Äôt what you were expecting or is faulty in some way please contact the vendor themselves directly. You have 14 days from receiving the item to contact the vendor to arrange a return. Some items may not be returnable for hygiene reasons such as earrings etc. If you require a refund the vendor will contact us to arrange this.
Any products sold by Medico Lifestyle are delivered worldwide but each vendor may have different places they will send to. It‚Äôs always best to check when you put in your address at checkout.

settings.faq_question: I have a question about a specific product
settings.faq_answer: If you want to know any more info about a specific product just ask. You can contact us via our contact form, emailing us or by finding us on Instagram and sending us a message. We will do our best to answer as soon as possible.
